package.name: linux-amd64
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.patch:
localversion='ll-64-0'
major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` cd linux-${major}.${minor} unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz | patch -p1 cp -v ${SRCDIR}/lesslinux-fblogo-20100922.ppm drivers/video/logo/logo_linux_clut224.ppm cp -v ${SRCDIR}/linux-3.17-config-amd64 .config sed -i 's/CONFIG_LOCALVERSION=""/CONFIG_LOCALVERSION="-'$localversion'"/g' .config cd .. mv linux-${major}.${minor} linux-${PKGVERSION}
package.build: cd linux-${PKGVERSION} export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin:$PATH yes '' | make ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-" oldconfig if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` pump make -j $jobcount \ ARCH=x86_64 \ CROSS_COMPILE=x86_64-linux-gnu- \ CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' pump make -j $jobcount \ ARCH=x86_64 \ CROSS_COMPILE=x86_64-linux-gnu- \ CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' \ bzImage else make -j 4 ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-" make -j 4 ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-" bzImage fi
package.install:
localversion='ll-64-0'
export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin:$PATH cd linux-${PKGVERSION} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/boot mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ln -sf linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-lesslinux-amd64 INSTALL_MOD_PATH=${TGTDIR} make ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=x86_64-linux-gnu- modules_install install -m 0644 arch/x86/boot/bzImage ${TGTDIR}/boot/vmlinuz-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} rm -rf ${TGTDIR}/lib/firmware ln -sf ${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/lesslinux-amd64 for link in source build ; do rm ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion}/$link ln -sf /usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion}/${link} done find ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} -type f -name '*.ko' -exec x86_64-linux-gnu-strip --strip-unneeded {} \; make clean make ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=x86_64-linux-gnu- modules_prepare tar -cvJf ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion}/linux.tar.xz .
